title: The Exchange
overview: Inspired by real events, two women set out to pioneer the cutthroat stock market of 1980s Kuwait - and disrupt its corrupt boys club along the way. Welcome to 80s Kuwait... the heyday of the stock market. Two Kuwaiti women are about to blaze a trail to become "Wonders of The Exchange", in a male-dominated workplace, where bets are bold, and stakes are sky-high!
